speaker: Agent
text: Hello, is this Mark Reynolds? This is Lisa calling from XYZ Collections.

speaker: Customer
text: No, this is not Mark. You must have the wrong number.

speaker: Agent
text: I apologize. I'm calling about an outstanding balance on an account with ABC Credit.

speaker: Customer
text: I really have no idea what you're talking about. I don’t owe anything.

speaker: Agent
text: I understand, and I’m sorry for the confusion. Can I confirm your name, just to update our records?

speaker: Customer
text: It's Sarah Thompson. I can assure you, I don’t have any debts.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Sarah. I will remove this number from our call list. Sorry for the inconvenience.

speaker: Customer
text: Thanks for understanding. Have a good day.
